title: **3 BEDROOM***PETS OK**AVAIL 8/1**laundry**LOTS OF GRASS**Central AC
map_address: W. 26th St near S. CALIFORNIA AVE
posting_body: AVAIL August 1st
This 3 bedroom unit is on the ground floor of a 2 story house.
The building has a commercial space on the 1st floor front and there is therefore limited noise.
The building is very neat and well-kept.
There are also security cameras covering all entrances/exits.
Unit has forced heat and CENTRAL AIR CONDITIONING.
Utilities are additional to rent (usually combined $150 monthly for both gas and electricity).
The unit has 3 bedrooms that fit king beds and all have their own closets.
The kitchen has lots of cabinet space.
The unit boasts ceramic floors throughout.
The bathroom is spacious and has tub/shower combination.
There is coin laundry in the building.
There is also an outside rear patio that can be used during the summer months for barbequeing.
One garage parking spot is available for $125 monthly.
Plenty of free street parking.
Steps away from all major highways via I-55.
Bus #60 leads to downtown/UIC/union station.
Pink line runs along 22nd avenue (5 blocks away).
Pets allowed with an additional $25 monthly fee per pet.
Credit check with a MINIMUM score of 600 (NO EXCEPTIONS) and criminal background check is strictly enforced.
A $850 jon-refundable move-in fee plus 1st month's rent is required to move in once qualification is established.
Lease required.
Location: W. 26th
St & S. California Ave, 60608
Please call 312-286-3434.
PLEASE CALL, NO TEXTS
